description:
Cloud Computing has changed the way we look at and understand all our IT infrastructure. Don't be left behind, learn the latest technology today.

Microsoft Azure (formerly Windows Azure) is a cloud computing platform and infrastructure, created by Microsoft. It is the biggest competitor for Amazon and Google in this area.

This course is the fastest, most affortable and smartest way to get you started with the Microsoft Azure Platform and Services in the Cloud.

You will learn how to create your first website and server on the platform in a few simple steps. No long and boring lectures - we go straight to the point. We start from scratch and I talk you through all steps that you have to take to start your journey with Microsoft Azure.

  • Introduction to Cloud Computing
  • Creating an account in Microsoft Azure
  • Dashboard overview
  • Your website in the cloud!
  • How to add your own domain in Azure
  • Deploy Windows Server 2012 easily
  • Models explained: SAAS, PAAS and IAAS
  • Overview of more advanced features (e.g. VPN, storage)

The course is perfect for anyone seeking to learn how to start with Azure and create a website or deploy a server in the cloud.

Join now!
title: Microsoft Azure - Cloud Computing made simple
